msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />? Outside, ? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Maybe it's part of a treasure hunt?!

<20_2 arg="10" />I get a real neat feeling every time I walk by this spot and see there.<20_2 arg="9" /><20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />The feeling is like a squiggly, warm, happy sensation. It makes me really like walking here, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />D'ya know why there's
<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />out here, ?It's 'cause<10_4 />someone put it out here! Mystery solved! I'm a detective!<10_4 /> Probably.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> outdoors is the best!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Now I can watch TV shows with the outside bugs, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />We can play whatever we want on the .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />! We should have a snack party out here! Good food, good tunes, and good friends!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I can tell time when I'm outside with this !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I always check it when I'm on a walk to make sure my tummy clock is synced right, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> looks real happy!<20_2 arg="9" />Sunbathing, soakin' up rain <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />The outdoors is great! We oughta go sometime!
Do <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />ya think I'm allowed to use the here?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Because I got a soup recipe I'm too scared to try indoors!
If I put a buncha snacks<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> on the It'd be a party for everyone! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />And the outside bugs could join in since it's an outside party!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I always make sure nobody's sitting on that .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I like to keep it empty so there's someplace for Grandma to sit if she comes to visit!

Hey, ? <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="9" /> Why ya think it's outdoors?<20_3 arg="6" />What <20_3 arg="3" />a mystery! Only one guy can crack a nut this tough<10_10 />BAGEL BOY JR.!<10_11 />That's my superhero nameâ€”don't tell anyone.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />? Outside?HANG ON!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />This is the wish I made! On that shooting star! WHEN I WISHED FOR OUTDOOR FOOD! OH! WOW!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I don't really know how to use .Does anybody, really?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />The makes me wanna go camping!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Eating some yummy food beside a campfire and talking to night bugs? Yeah! I should do it!
<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />I have an inside source saying moths wanna thank whoever put here.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It's soooo convenient having
out here.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Now I can see all my cool grass stains the same way everyone else does, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />? Here?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Was someone moving and got bored, ?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />What's it doing out here all by its lonesome, ?It's no big if the weather's nice, but what about rainy days? Miniature umbrellas aren't easy to make.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />What an interesting place to keep .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I always considered them to be indoor pets, but if you keep 'em out here, your floors stay dryer. Of course, there are both pros and cons to that, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Now that's a perfect place to put !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I like looking at old stuff like this, but the museum always makes me super sleepy, . Now I can just admire this fossil and nap out here!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Is this a good spot for something like ?I was explicitly told more than once that fine art needs to be protected.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Juggle three mugs of one time and suddenly you can't be trusted, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It's not every day you get to see .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But I guess that's not true. If it's gonna be out here, I'll be walking by it all the time. How cool is that?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />So there's such a thing as an outside , huh?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I don't quite believe it, but I also didn't believe in chocolate-covered raisins until I finally tried one. That was a harsh reality to face.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It's so considerate to put here.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I bet the wind gets tired of blowing all the time. Mother Nature needs her sleep too, people!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Being out here must be strange for .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />This island probably looks like an alien planet to him, !

<20_2 arg="10" />What the! Well, wouldja look at that?<20_2 arg="9" /> There's a picture of me lying around. Butwhy?!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Oh! Do you think I have a secret admirer? A huh huh, that's a little weirdbut a little cool!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Was someone playing outside with their ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I don't blame 'em. This stuff is way more fun outside where there's plenty of room!Every time folks invite me to play outside thoughoutside's so big, I never know where they mean!
<20_2 arg="10" />Kind of a funny place to put , huh?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I better be careful Last time I touched one of these, it took me forever to lick all the jam off.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Look what someone left outside! !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I wonder if someone saw my room and was trying to send me a message.If they wereI gotcha loud and clear!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Who'd go and leave out ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I thought these are supposed to go inside, but maybe I know way less about how to use 'em than I figured.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I feel warm and squishy when I go by .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I mean, feeling squishy is great, but feeling both warm AND squishy? Ooo, that's the best, !
